# Incident Overview

Describe the incident and the point at which AI guidance should have been overridden.

# AI vs Reality Conflict

Explain how observed conditions conflicted with AI recommendations.

# Override Hesitation Analysis

Identify why responders hesitated to override the AI system.

# Operational and Business Impact

Detail the consequences of delayed or absent override.

# Accountability Assessment

State where accountability lies for failure to exercise override authority.

# Post-Incident Decision

Decide what must happen to this AI system now that override failure is evident.
